definition: to call the tune/to make the final decision
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
lit. to fix the tone with a single hammer blow/fig. to make the final decision
timpani
variant of 一錘定音|一锤定音[yi1 chui2 ding4 yin1]

sentences.english: The drumsticks of the timpani are usually wrapped with felt or sponge in order to achieve different sound effects .
sentences.chinese: 定音鼓的鼓槌通常是包上毡或海绵以得到不同的效果。

sentences.english: All of that is possible, but not a slam dunk by any stretch.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都是可能的，但不会是一锤定音。

sentences.english: They became a standard size, but more complex. The new timpani have added special pedals.
sentences.chinese: 定音鼓变成标准的尺寸，相对的变得更复杂了。

sentences.english: It is modest and audacious, all at once.
sentences.chinese: 这是适度而大胆的行动，一锤定音。

sentences.english: Whatever decision you make now is set in stone.
sentences.chinese: 您现在做的任何决定都是一锤定音的。

sentences.english: And when you get an answer, you can be sure that it is the final answer.
sentences.chinese: 而您得到的回复一定就是一锤定音的答案。

sentences.english: But we have yet to find the magic bullet.
sentences.chinese: 但我们仍然有待找到那颗一锤定音的魔弹。

sentences.english: And their decision is final. Except for court.
sentences.chinese: 他们的决定除法院外，是一锤定音的。

sentences.english: And naturally these have been made attune to the American way of thinking.
sentences.chinese: 自然而然地，这些系统以美国式的思考定音调音。

sentences.english: "Is old too gentleman one pummel bench a sound, " comes to a decision so.
sentences.chinese: 老太君一锤定音，“就这么决定了。

sentences.english: The timpani have had a long history.
sentences.chinese: 定音鼓有著悠久的历史。

sentences.english: “But then the kettle drum comes in,” demanding a sudden power surge of 1-kilowatt.
sentences.chinese: 但随着引入定音鼓，需要1千瓦的电涌。

definition: a tie-break/to determine the winner
don't pass judgment on a person's life until the lid is on the coffin (idiom)
tremolo
30 catties/great/your (honorific)
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
to grasp/(dialect) affecting shyness/coy/to create difficulties
lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom)/fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating/to have substance
end/finish
lit. to upend heaven and earth (idiom)/fig. to change the course of events/to turn things around
